timeline.description: A framework for building web applications, developed by Facebook

entries.title: React
entries.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, developed by Facebook. It allows developers to create reusable UI components and manage the state of their applications efficiently.

timeline.description: A framework for building web applications, developed by Google

entries.title: Angular
entries.description: Angular is a platform for building mobile and desktop web applications, developed by Google. It provides a comprehensive set of tools and libraries for building complex applications with a focus on performance and maintainability.

timeline.description: Code Assistance is a feature of IDEs that provides intelligent code completion, code analysis, and refactoring tools to help developers write code more efficiently.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot
entries.description: GitHub Copilot is a code completion and automatic programming tool developed by GitHub and OpenAI that assists users of Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, Neovim, and JetBrains integrated development environments by autocompleting code.

timeline.description: Code Assistance is a feature of IDEs that provides intelligent code completion, code analysis, and refactoring tools to help developers write code more efficiently.

entries.title: Amazon Q
entries.description: Assists developers by providing code suggestions, documentation, and testing tools via various integrated development environments (IDEs) and command line interfaces.

timeline.description: A solution to help teams streamline processes from product discovery to delivery.

entries.title: Aha!
entries.description: A management solution designed to help teams set strategies, prioritize features, and create visually appealing roadmaps to manage and communicate product plans effectively.

timeline.description: Provides a comprehensive set of services for software development, including planning, tracking, building, testing, and deploying applications across various languages and platforms.

entries.title: Azure DevOps
entries.description: Azure DevOps is a platform that supports software development with cloud or on-premises services.

entries.title: docker
entries.description: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries and configuration files; they can communicate with each other through well-defined channels. All containers share the OS kernel of the host machine and, where appropriate, binaries and libraries. Containers take up less space than virtual machines, and start up almost instantly. Docker is a company that provides an open source project and commercial software for automating the deployment of applications inside software containers.

timeline.description: Rust is memory-safe programming language without garbage collection

entries.title: Rust
entries.description: Rust is a fast, reliable, and productive programming language that can run on embedded devices, web services, and more.
